entries.text: Good afternoon, Example Loans support, you're speaking with Alex. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. Your app is saying my repayment failed. But I paid it. I definitely paid it. This is wasting my time.
I'm really sorry for the hassle. Let me check that for you right now. First, I just need to verify your identity. Can I get your full name please?
Thanks Samantha. And can you confirm your date of birth and postcode for me?

Thank you. Alright, I can see here that a payment attempt was rejected by the bank overnight. It looks like it may have been a temporary hold on the bank's side. Do you see a pending transaction showing in your bank account?
Yes, it's showing as pending. But your system sent me this really alarming message saying payment failed. That's not okay—it stressed me out.

You're absolutely right to raise that, and I apologise for the stress it caused. I'll log some feedback about the wording of those messages. For now, what I can do is place a short grace note on your account so you won't be penalised while the payment clears through.
Good, do that. And also—stop calling me during my work meetings. Someone called at 10am yesterday and it was really embarrassing. I was presenting to my team.
I completely understand, that's not ideal at all. I can update your contact preferences. What's your preferred contact time, and which number should we use?
Only after 5:30pm. My mobile is 0491 044 120. And email me any confirmations—don't just call.
Sure thing. What email address should I send confirmations to?
Perfect, I've got that down. I've updated your contact preference to after 5:30pm only on your mobile. And I've added a note about the repayment alert wording for our product team.
Thanks. Look, I was pretty mad when I called. Just... fix the issue and let me know.
Totally fair, Samantha. I'll email you a case reference number and the grace note details within the hour. Is there anything else I can help with today?
No worries. Thanks for calling and I hope the rest of your day goes smoothly. Take care.
